title: Little Women
brief_description: One of the most enduring of the Hollywood movie classics, “Little Women” is based on Louisa May Alcott’s beloved novel. It is the story of four sisters who grow up together in Massachusetts during the Civil War. We enter their world to share their joys and sorrows as they become the “little women” that their father so proudly calls them. Stars Katherine Hepburn, Douglas Montgomery, Paul Lukas, Joan Bennett, Frances Dee and Jean Parker.
